question: Are both <Liang> and <Asa> humans or animals? A. Humans. B. Animals.
What are the genders of <Liang> and <Asa> respectively? A. Man, Woman. B. Woman, Man.
What type of clothing do <Liang> and <Asa> often wear? A. Formal, Elegant. B. Casual, Sporty.
Do <Liang> and <Asa> often wear accessories like ties or necklaces? A. Yes. B. No.
What is the hair color of <Liang> and <Asa> respectively? A. Both have dark hair. B. Light and dark hair.
